Topic.Title: Theres only one company that wants Dell

Message.Msg: Dell is "worth" $13.30 today. Any "gutting" of the company would make Dell worth less than it is today. Hope this helps.

Message.Title: I bought my 1st comp in 96 ... It was Compaq....
Message.Msg: I then bought a Dell 3 months later... I still have it and it works even after a few crashes... I don't use it but for storage,but It's still there and working.. I respect someone who puts out something that last's in the face of progress....BTW...Thanks for those AWSOME ALTEC LANSING speakers ...They are still cooking ''''
